hibernate-mapping.query: select s from LksData s where s.lksId = ?
select s from LksData s where s.lkpValueCode = ?
select s from LksData s where s.lkpTypeName = ? order by s.lkpValue
select s from LksData s where s.lkpTypeName = ? and s.lkpValue = ?
select s from LksData s where s.lkpValue = ?
select s from LksData s where s.lkpValue = ? and s.lkpTypeName = ?
select s from LksData s where upper(s.lkpValue) = UPPER(?) and upper(s.lkpTypeName) = upper(?)
